welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wadern, Germany! Known for its picturesque landscapes and charming small-town vibe, we invite you to explore our quaint city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in the beauty of Wadern."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ensheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ensheim Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Findel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Findel Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ramstein Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for military and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
